scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Academic Affairs Collection houses materials such as departmental records, course descriptions, class schedules from 1975- 1983 and other materials related to academic departments and courses offered at Radford from 1934-present. Transfer of materials has been inconsistent over the years, and many materials are not in the Archives. A general request was sent to all academic departments in the summer of 2010 to transfer all records 5 years or older to the Archives.

Box 4. Academic Affairs- Aculty Lists, Salaries, and Information: 1968-1978
Box 5. Academic Affairs- Faculty Affairs minutes, General Faculty minutes, Graduate Affairs minutes, College of Education minutes: 1973- 1991
Box 8. Academic Affairs- American Association Collegiate Schools of Business, Ad hoc Committee, Faculty related information
Box 9. Academic Affairs- Assorted Academic Affairs
